publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3010 Ms Margo MacDonald: Statement on Holyrood Projectâ€”That the Parliament requests that the Presiding Officer, as Chair of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body, make an accurate statement to the Parliament on the expected completion date, entry date, estimated cost of the new Parliament building and costs associated with any slippage in the timetable for completion and entry previously intimated to the Parliament. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Alex Neil*

S1M-3010 Ms Margo MacDonald: Statement on Holyrood Project-That the Parliament requests that the Presiding Officer, as Chair of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body, make an accurate statement to the Parliament on the expected completion date, entry date, estimated cost of the new Parliament building and costs associated with any slippage in the timetable for completion and entry previously intimated to the Parliament. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Alex Neil
S1M-3010 Statement on Holyrood Project (lodged on 18 April 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3010 Statement on Holyrood Project (lodged on 18 April 2002) Phil Gallie*
S1M-3010 Statement on Holyrood Project (lodged on 18 April 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3010 Statement on Holyrood Project (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3010 Statement on Holyrood Project (lodged on 18 April 2002) Donald Gorrie*
